Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the soundtrack of the movie '3 Idiots'?
Options:
A. Shantanu Moitra composed the soundtrack for '3 Idiots'.
B. '3 Idiots' is the title of the soundtrack album.
C. 'Give Me Some Sunshine' is a song featured in the soundtrack.
D. Shantanu Moitra directed the movie '3 Idiots'.
Answer: A) Shantanu Moitra composed the soundtrack for '3 Idiots', B) '3 Idiots' is the title of the soundtrack album, C) 'Give Me Some Sunshine' is a song featured in the soundtrack.
